ARABIC: هُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: they and their wives reclining on couches in the shade.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They and their companions will recline on couches in the shade.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: they and their spouses shall be reclining on their couches in shady groves;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They and their spouses will recline on couches in the shade therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They and their wives are in shades, reclining on thrones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They and their wives will be in pleasant shade, reclining on thrones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They and their wives shall be in shades, reclining on raised couches.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: they and their spouses, reclining upon couches in the shade;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They and their wives, in pleasant shade, on thrones reclining;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: they and their wives, shall recline on couches in the shade.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They and their spouses, in shade on couches shall be reclining.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —they and their mates, reclining on couches in the shades.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They and their associates will be in groves of (cool) shade, reclining on Thrones (of dignity);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They and their wives will be in pleasant shade, reclining on thrones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Together with their spouses, they shall recline on couches in the shade.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They and their spouses, in shades, reclining on couches.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They and their spouses - in shade, reclining on adorned couches.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:56] they (hum, the subject) and their spouses, beneath the shade (zilāl is the plural of zulla or zill, and is the predicate) in other words, no [blinding] sunlight affects them, reclining upon (muttaki’ūna is a second predicate, connected to ‘alā, ‘upon’) couches (arā’ik is the plural of arīka, which is a bed inside a curtained canopy, or the bedding therein).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They and their wives, in pleasant shade, on thrones reclining;
